realm.name: prepa-role
realm.description: Assigned to PREPA (Preparatory) students — grants access to preparatory program resources and courses

realm.name: employee-role
realm.description: A general employee role that might cover shared privileges for all staff (teachers, admins, maintenance).

realm.name: mti-role
realm.description: Assigned to MTI students — grants access to MTI-specific resources and courses

realm.name: srs-role
realm.description: Assigned to SRS (Systems, Networks and Security) students — grants access to SRS-specific resources and courses

realm.name: employee-admin-role
realm.description: Elevated privileges for employees in administrative positions — user management, system config, etc.

realm.name: employee-maintenance-role
realm.description: For maintenance staff — access to building systems, and maintenance apps.

realm.name: gitm-role
realm.description: Assigned to GITM (IT Management) students — grants access to GITM-specific resources and courses

realm.name: teacher-role
realm.description: Specific to teachers — allows managing classes, grading, and accessing teaching tools.

realm.name: quantum-role
realm.description: Assigned to QUANTUM students — grants access to quantum computing resources and specialized courses

realm.name: image-role
realm.description: Assigned to IMAGE (Computer Graphics and Multimedia) students — grants access to IMAGE-specific resources and courses

realm.name: scia-role
realm.description: Assigned to SCIA (AI) students — grants access to SCIA-specific resources and courses

realm.name: sigl-role
realm.description: Assigned to SIGL students — grants access to SIGL-specific resources and courses

realm.name: student-role
realm.description: Assigned to all student users — grants access to student-specific resources like course materials and schedules

policies.name: Student Access Policy
policies.description: Limits resource access to students (student-role) only.

policies.name: Teacher Access Policy
policies.description: Restricts access to teaching and grading resources to users with the teacher-role.

policies.name: Administration Access Policy
policies.description: Grants access to users with administrative privileges (e.g., those with employee-admin-role).

policies.name: Employee Access Policy
policies.description: Allows general employees to access employee-specific resources (all staff except students).

policies.name: Maintenance Access Policy
policies.description: Restricts access to maintenance-related resources only to maintenance staff (employee-maintenance-role).

policies.name: GITM Access Policy
policies.description: Restricts access to GITM-specific course materials and resources to GITM students and teachers.

policies.name: SCIA Access Policy
policies.description: Restricts access to SCIA-specific course materials and resources to SCIA students and teachers.

policies.name: SIGL Access Policy
policies.description: Restricts access to SIGL-specific course materials and resources to SIGL students and teachers.

policies.name: IMAGE Access Policy
policies.description: Restricts access to IMAGE-specific course materials and resources to IMAGE students and teachers.

policies.name: QUANTUM Access Policy
policies.description: Restricts access to QUANTUM-specific course materials and lab resources to QUANTUM students and teachers.

policies.name: SRS Access Policy
policies.description: Restricts access to SRS-specific course materials and lab resources to SRS students and teachers.

policies.name: MTI Access Policy
policies.description: Restricts access to MTI-specific course materials and resources to MTI students and teachers.

policies.name: PREPA Access Policy
policies.description: Restricts access to PREPA-specific course materials and resources to PREPA students and teachers.

policies.name: General Lab Access Policy
policies.description: Allows access to general computer labs for all students.

policies.name: Admin Portal Access
policies.description: Enables admins to manage users, roles, and system config.

policies.name: Course Portal Access
policies.description: Allows students and teachers to view/manage courses.

policies.name: Employee Portal Access
policies.description: Provides general employee services like HR info, schedules.

policies.name: Grade Submission Access
policies.description: Lets teachers enter and update student grades.

policies.name: Maintenance Dashboard Access
policies.description: Enables maintenance staff to maintain the IT structures at EPITA and allow then to see performance of the applications and more.

policies.name: GITM Course Materials Access
policies.description: Allows GITM students and teachers to access GITM-specific course materials and assignments.

policies.name: SCIA Course Materials Access
policies.description: Allows SCIA students and teachers to access SCIA-specific course materials and assignments.

policies.name: SIGL Course Materials Access
policies.description: Allows SIGL students and teachers to access SIGL-specific course materials and assignments.

policies.name: IMAGE Course Materials Access
policies.description: Allows IMAGE students and teachers to access IMAGE-specific course materials and assignments.

policies.name: QUANTUM Course Materials Access
policies.description: Allows QUANTUM students and teachers to access QUANTUM-specific course materials and assignments.

policies.name: SRS Course Materials Access
policies.description: Allows SRS students and teachers to access SRS-specific course materials and assignments.

policies.name: MTI Course Materials Access
policies.description: Allows MTI students and teachers to access MTI-specific course materials and assignments.

policies.name: PREPA Course Materials Access
policies.description: Allows PREPA students and teachers to access PREPA-specific course materials and assignments.

policies.name: Quantum Lab Access
policies.description: Allows QUANTUM students and teachers to access specialized quantum computing lab equipment and resources.

policies.name: Image Studio Access
policies.description: Allows IMAGE students and teachers to access specialized image processing and multimedia studio equipment.

policies.name: Network Lab Access
policies.description: Allows SRS students and teachers to access specialized networking and security lab equipment.

policies.name: Computer Labs Access
policies.description: Allows all students to access general computer labs for coursework and projects.

policies.name: Internship Portal Access
policies.description: Allows students to search for, apply to, and manage internship opportunities.

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token
